column2: (ED:PT) Open Notifications Submenu
The notifications submenu allows you to receive alerts when your character fulfils certain conditions - ie. when you might want to take an in-game action to rectify something
(ED:PT) Magicka Full: DISABLED - Toggle on?
You are NOT currently being notified when your Magicka is completely refilled. Click this decision to enable the notification.
(ED:PT) Magicka Full: ENABLED - Toggle off?
You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka is completely refilled. Click this decision to disable the notification.
(ED:PT) Magicka Half-Full: DISABLED - Toggle on?
You are NOT currently being notified when your Magicka is refilled to half-full. Click this decision to enable the notification.
(ED:PT) Magicka Half-Full: ENABLED - Toggle off?
You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka is refilled to half-full. Click this decision to disable the notification.

column1: # Intrigue Menu Decisions - Magicka Unused - Spellcaster

column2: (ED:PT) Magicka Unused: DISABLED - Toggle on (1y)?

You are NOT currently being notified when your Magicka seems to be unused (ie. is 90% or more of the maximum) for a long period of time.\n§g...INFO: Available options for the notification interval are: off, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years.§!\nClick this decision to be notified if your Magicka is unused for §Y1 year§!.
(ED:PT) Magicka Unused: ENABLED (1 year) - Toggle 3y?

You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka seems to be unused (ie. is 90% or more of the maximum) for §Y1 year§!.\n§g...INFO: Available options for the notification interval are: off, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years.§!\nClick this decision to be notified if your Magicka is unused for §Y3 years§!.
(ED:PT) Magicka Unused: ENABLED (3 years) - Toggle 5y?

You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka seems to be unused (ie. is 90% or more of the maximum) for §Y3 years§!.\n§g...INFO: Available options for the notification interval are: off, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years.§!\nClick this decision to be notified if your Magicka is unused for §Y5 years§!.
(ED:PT) Magicka Unused: ENABLED (5 years) - Toggle off?

You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka seems to be unused (ie. is 90% or more of the maximum) for §Y5 years§!.\n§g...INFO: Available options for the notification interval are: off, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years.§!\nClick this decision to §Rdisable§! all Magicka Unused notifications.

column1: # Intrigue Menu Decisions - Magicka Unused - Non-Spellcaster

column2: (ED:PT) Magicka Unused: ENABLED (1 year) but POINTLESS - Toggle off?

You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka seems to be unused (ie. is 90% or more of the maximum) for §Y1 year§!.
§g...INFO: Available options for the notification interval are: off, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years.§!
However, this is §Ypointless§! because §Yyou do NOT currently have access to Magicka§!, so you will never actually receive a notification!
Click this decision to §Rdisable§! all Magicka Unused notifications.
(ED:PT) Magicka Unused: ENABLED (3 years) but POINTLESS - Toggle off?

You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka seems to be unused (ie. is 90% or more of the maximum) for §Y3 years§!.
§g...INFO: Available options for the notification interval are: off, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years.§!
However, this is §Ypointless§! because §Yyou do NOT currently have access to Magicka§!, so you will never actually receive a notification!
Click this decision to §Rdisable§! all Magicka Unused notifications.
(ED:PT) Magicka Unused: ENABLED (5 years) but POINTLESS - Toggle off?

You ARE currently being notified when your Magicka seems to be unused (ie. is 90% or more of the maximum) for §Y5 years§!.
§g...INFO: Available options for the notification interval are: off, 1 year, 3 years, and 5 years.§!
However, this is §Ypointless§! because §Yyou do NOT currently have access to Magicka§!, so you will never actually receive a notification!
Click this decision to §Rdisable§! all Magicka Unused notifications.

column1: # Intrigue Menu Decisions - Magicka Unused - Bugged

column2: (ED:PT) Magicka Unused: BUGGED - Toggle off to fix?
Somehow, your Magicka Unused notification settings have become bugged. Please turn them off (using this decision) to fix the issue.

column1: # Intrigue Menu Decisions - Potion Effect Ended

column2: (ED:PT) Potion Effect Ended: DISABLED - Toggle on?
You are NOT currently being notified when your current potion effect expires. Click this decision to enable the notification.
(ED:PT) Potion Effect Ended: ENABLED - Toggle off?
You ARE currently being notified when your current potion effect expires. Click this decision to disable the notification.
My Magicka pool is full!
I feel energised - veritably brimming with magicka - as if anything is possible!
My Magicka pool is half-full!
I am slowly recovering from my previous magickal exertions
My Magicka pool is going unused!
I have not used any significant amount of magicka for a whole year - it feels like my magical talents are being wasted!
I have not used any significant amount of magicka for 3 whole years - it feels like my magical talents are being wasted!
I have not used any significant amount of magicka for 5 whole years - it feels like my magical talents are being wasted!

I have not used any significant amount of magicka for a long time - it feels like my magical talents are being wasted!\n(Note: This notification's settings may be bugged - please check the intrigue menu and disable/re-enable if necessary.)
My Alchemical potion has expired!
I woke up this morning and realised that the potion I bought from the marketplace has expired.\n\nPerhaps I should return to buy another?
Disable this notification
The §YMagicka Full§! notification will be §Rdisabled§!
The §YMagicka Half-Full§! notification will be §Rdisabled§!
The §YMagicka Unused§! notification will be §Rdisabled§!
The §YPotion Effect Ended§! notification will be §Genabled§!
The §YPotion Effect Ended§! notification will be §Rdisabled§!
§M(ED:PT)§! Notification Enabled - Magicka Half-Full
The presence of this modifier on a character indicates that the §YMagicka Half-Full§! notification is §Genabled§!.
§M(ED:PT)§! Notification Enabled - Magicka Full
The presence of this modifier on a character indicates that the §YMagicka Full§! notification is §Genabled§!.
§M(ED:PT)§! Notification Enabled - Potion Effect Ended
The presence of this modifier on a character indicates that the §YPotion Effect Ended§! notification is §Genabled§!.
§M(ED:PT)§! Notification Enabled - Magicka Unused - 1 year
The presence of this modifier on a character indicates that the §YMagicka Unused§! notification is §Genabled§!, with notifications every §Y1 year§!.
§M(ED:PT)§! Notification Enabled - Magicka Unused - 3 years
The presence of this modifier on a character indicates that the §YMagicka Unused§! notification is §Genabled§!, with notifications every §Y3 years§!.
§M(ED:PT)§! Notification Enabled - Magicka Unused - 5 years
The presence of this modifier on a character indicates that the §YMagicka Unused§! notification is §Genabled§!, with notifications every §Y5 years§!.
